fields.title: The Mountain in the Sea
fields.description: A thought-provoking sci-fi novel exploring AI, consciousness, and cephalopod intelligence.
fields.abstract: A gripping exploration of artificial intelligence and deep-sea mysteries.
fields.author: Ray Nayler

fields.title: Sea of Tranquility
fields.description: A genre-bending novel about time travel and the nature of reality.
fields.abstract: A beautifully written meditation on time and existence.
fields.author: Emily St. John Mandel

fields.title: Dead Silence
fields.description: A horror-infused sci-fi thriller set on a ghost spaceship.
fields.abstract: A chilling mix of space exploration and psychological horror.
fields.author: S.A. Barnes

fields.title: The Terraformers
fields.description: An ambitious story about planetary engineering and ecological preservation.
fields.abstract: A visionary novel about the future of terraforming and sustainability.
fields.author: Annalee Newitz

fields.title: The Space Between Worlds
fields.description: A multiverse adventure where only certain versions of a person can cross dimensions.
fields.abstract: A unique take on parallel universes and identity.
fields.author: Micaiah Johnson

fields.title: A Psalm for the Wild-Built
fields.description: A quiet, contemplative sci-fi about a monk and a robot seeking meaning in life.
fields.abstract: A heartwarming and philosophical tale about purpose and connection.
fields.author: Becky Chambers

fields.title: Shards of Earth
fields.description: A space opera featuring an alien war, mysterious artifacts, and interstellar intrigue.
fields.abstract: An epic journey through the cosmos filled with action and mystery.
fields.author: Adrian Tchaikovsky

fields.title: The Ministry for the Future
fields.description: A near-future sci-fi novel tackling climate change and global survival strategies.
fields.abstract: A thought-provoking exploration of our planet’s future.
fields.author: Kim Stanley Robinson

fields.title: Project Hail Mary
fields.description: A lone astronaut must save Earth from an existential threat in this gripping space adventure.
fields.abstract: A thrilling survival story in deep space by the author of The Martian.
fields.author: Andy Weir

fields.title: The Kaiju Preservation Society
fields.description: A fun and thrilling adventure about giant creatures living in an alternate dimension.
fields.abstract: A witty and action-packed story filled with humor and monsters.
fields.author: John Scalzi

fields.title: The Odyssey
fields.description: An epic poem attributed to Homer, detailing Odysseus' journey home.
fields.abstract: A classic of Greek literature.
fields.author: Homer

fields.title: To Kill a Mockingbird
fields.description: A novel about the serious issues of rape and racial inequality.
fields.abstract: A timeless American classic.
fields.author: Harper Lee

fields.description: A dystopian social science fiction novel and cautionary tale.
fields.abstract: A warning against totalitarianism.
fields.author: George Orwell

fields.title: The Great Gatsby
fields.description: A novel about the American dream and society in the 1920s.
fields.abstract: A critique of the Jazz Age.
fields.author: F. Scott Fitzgerald

fields.title: Pride and Prejudice
fields.description: A romantic novel critiquing the British landed gentry.
fields.abstract: One of the most loved romance novels.
fields.author: Jane Austen

fields.title: Jane Eyre
fields.description: A coming-of-age story that revolutionized the art of fiction.
fields.abstract: A landmark in women's literature.
fields.author: Charlotte Brontë

fields.title: Moby-Dick
fields.description: A novel about a captain's obsession with a white whale.
fields.abstract: A masterpiece of American literature.
fields.author: Herman Melville

fields.title: Frankenstein
fields.description: A Gothic novel about a scientist and his monstrous creation.
fields.abstract: A pioneering work of science fiction.
fields.author: Mary Shelley

fields.title: Dracula
fields.description: A novel that introduced the character of Count Dracula.
fields.abstract: The classic vampire novel.
fields.author: Bram Stoker

fields.title: Les Misérables
fields.description: A novel that examines the nature of law and grace.
fields.abstract: One of the greatest novels of the 19th century.
fields.author: Victor Hugo
